raw_text: DIAS,​ DOROTHY – Beloved wife of the late Bede,​ cherished mother of Rohan (USA),​ Nirmal,​ Srilal (Australia) and remembered in loving memory of the late Thilak,​ Ivan and Luckie (UK). She was mother-in-law to Illika,​ Sandamali,​ Marina,​ Renuka and Prasanna,​ Dorothy was a loving sister to Edna Devagiri and Ranjaini Abeysena. She peacefully departed from us on the 3rd of September 2023. Her remains will be placed for viewing at 681,​ Aluthmawatha Road,​ Mutwal,​ Colombo 15,​ on the 8th of September from midday. Cortege leaves at 3 p.m. on the 9th for burial at Madampitiya Cemetery after the service at St. James Church,​ Mutwal.056673

MITHRAL PERERA – Beloved husband of Sherrine Perera (Former Teacher Wesley College),​ loving father of Sandesh and Thilini,​ Shenal,​ Michelle and Shakya,​ grandfather of Shahen and Kylie,​ brother of Mohilal and Sunimal. The mortal remains will lie at No. 20/​1,​ Moragasmulla Road,​ Rajagiriya from 10 a.m. on Saturday,​ 9th September. Cortege leaves residence at 3.30 p.m. on Monday,​ 11th September for St. Stephen’s Church,​ Moragasmulla,​ Rajagiriya. No flowers by request.057117
